universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Interface Pullable.OnPullListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    Pullable

    public static interface Pullable.OnPullListener
    Listener which can receive callbacks about the started, performed, released or collapsed pull.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPull(Pullable pullable, Pullable.Pull pull)
      Invoked whenever a user performs (by touch) the pull upon the specified pullable view.
      void onPullCollapsed(Pullable pullable)
      Invoked whenever the current pull of the specified pullable view has been collapsed.
      void onPullReleased(Pullable pullable, Pullable.Pull pull)
      Invoked whenever a user releases the pull upon the specified pullable view.
      void onPullStarted(Pullable pullable, Pullable.Pull pull)
      Invoked whenever a user initiates (by touch) the pull upon the specified pullable view.

    • Method Detail

      • onPullStarted

        void onPullStarted(@NonNull
                   Pullable pullable,
                   @NonNull
                   Pullable.Pull pull)
        Invoked whenever a user initiates (by touch) the pull upon the specified pullable view.
        Parameters:
        pullable - The view upon which has been pull started.
        pull - The initiated pull.

      • onPull

        void onPull(@NonNull
            Pullable pullable,
            @NonNull
            Pullable.Pull pull)
        Invoked whenever a user performs (by touch) the pull upon the specified pullable view.

        Note, that position of the pull can be either positive or negative. Positive indicates pull at the start of the pullable view, negative indicates pull at the end of the pullable view. Start/End are determined by the orientation (Scrollable.getOrientation()) of the pullable view.

        Parameters:
        pullable - The view upon which has been pull performed.
        pull - The performed pull.

      • onPullReleased

        void onPullReleased(@NonNull
                    Pullable pullable,
                    @NonNull
                    Pullable.Pull pull)
        Invoked whenever a user releases the pull upon the specified pullable view.

        Note, that by default the PullController implementation will start animation to collapse the current pull before this callback is fired. This behaviour cannot be for now changed/cancelled, but can be changed in the feature.

        Parameters:
        pullable - The view upon which has been pull released.
        pull - The released pull.

      • onPullCollapsed

        void onPullCollapsed(@NonNull
                     Pullable pullable)
        Invoked whenever the current pull of the specified pullable view has been collapsed. This can be due to finished collapse animation after the pull has been released or a user moved the pull back to its origin.
